remarks.format: ## Remarks A提供對資料來源，查詢所傳回的資料之間的主要對應和。A provides a master mapping between the data returned from a query against a data source, and a . 可以傳遞名稱，取代名稱`Fill`方法**DataAdapter**。The name can be passed in place of the name to the `Fill` method of the **DataAdapter**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [DataAdapter DataTable 和 DataColumn 對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並將它加入至。The following example creates a object and adds it to a . 對應已新增至集合，並且會顯示對應的父代，它接著會通知使用者。It then informs the user that the mapping was added to the collection and displays the parent mapping. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在，它會傳回。If the exists, it is returned. 如果不存在，為給定，執行下列動作：If the does not exist, for a given , the following actions occur: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|採取的動作Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|會建立指定之來源的資料行名稱做為來源資料行名稱和資料行名稱。Creates a with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the column name. 這不會加入至集合。This is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|如果缺少指定的資料行對應，則會產生 。An is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|取得 null 值。Gets a null value.|

exception.span: 參數已經設定為 ，並且未指定任何對應。
